source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_00<tab>P'yandih appears to have been waiting for you.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_00<tab>ウルダハのペ・ヤンディは、冒険者の訪れを待っていたようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_01<tab>P'yandih, otherwise applauded in the Celestium as “Azuro the Fourth,” appears to have been awaiting your arrival. After a brief greeting, she hands you a letter from Martyn─a missive from the mysterious Far East. You scan the plaintive note and learn that the guildmaster has encountered some manner of trouble, and requests assistance at your earliest convenience. It would seem that your path leads to a teahouse in front of the Sekiseigumi Barracks in Kugane...
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_01<tab>ペ・ヤンディから、マーティンの手紙を渡された。クガネでの調査が進んでいないので、冒険者が協力することになった。クガネの第二波止場で「マーティン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_02<tab>You arrive in Kugane to find Martyn working in a teahouse, the odd conclusion to an unfortunate string of events that befell him not long after his own arrival in the city. Robbery and public indecency notwithstanding, the guildmaster assures you that he is finally able to set aside some time to pursue the true purpose of his journey. He would, however, appreciate any aid you can render during his investigation into the Fukumen Fighting Festival. To that end, you are to make your way to the Shiokaze Hostelry, and learn what information you may from the patrons within.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_02<tab>マーティンと話したところ、いろいろあって彼は茶屋で働いていた。「覆面闘技祭」の調査のため情報収集することになった。クガネの潮風亭で情報を集めよう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_03<tab>Your inquiries at the Shiokaze Hostelry have shed some light upon the nature of Kugane's own fighting arena. Return to Martyn and report your discoveries.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_03<tab>覆面闘技祭についての情報を集めた。第二波止場の「マーティン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_04<tab>You share your information with Martyn, and he reluctantly concludes that obtaining a ticket to the festival will require dealing with a black market merchant. Follow the guildmaster into the back alleys of Kogane Dori.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_04<tab>マーティンと話し、覆面闘技祭の入場券を闇商人から購入することになった。クガネの「小金通り」のマーティンと話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_05<tab>The shifty merchant you encounter is none other than Gyodo, the Namazu responsible for robbing Martyn in the first place. In an act of contrition─and sniveling cowardice─Gyodo returns the guildmaster's stolen money, and also presents him with an entry token to the festival. A few coins richer, Martyn suggests an immediate visit to the castle gates, where a Fighting Festival ticket taker should be waiting to admit you to the show.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_05<tab>闇商人こと、ギョドウからマーティンは入場券を入手した。覆面闘技祭を観戦するため、クガネの異人街の城門前にいる「覆面闘技祭のもぎり」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_06<tab>Although Gyodo appears to have deceived you with a cheap ticket, you nevertheless enter the festival and view the opening match. Martyn is appalled by the event's blatant similarities to the Masked Carnivale, and shocked to discover that the entrepreneurial combatant known as “Bluehood” speaks with the voice of Nutiba Buntiba. Before you can discover anything further, however, you are forced to exit the premises.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_06<tab>覆面闘技祭のもぎりと話し、覆面闘技祭を観戦した。マーティンは青頭巾なる闘士が、失踪したヌティバ・ブンティバだという。異人街の城門前にいる「マーティン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_07<tab>A furious Martyn decides to linger by the castle gates and wait for his dishonest disciple to emerge. Bluehood, when he eventually does appear, is adamant that he is not the person Martyn thinks he is. The festival's manager, Kageyama, then comes out to cut the guildmaster's tirade short. He challenges the “founder of blue magic” to prove the authenticity of his claims in a duel against the reigning champion, Golden Goliath─a proposal which Martyn recklessly accepts. Wondering at the wisdom of his decision, your erstwhile mentor hurries back to his post at the teahouse.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_07<tab>マーティンと話し、青頭巾を待ち伏せしたところ、彼はヌティバ・ブンティバではないと言い張り、覆面闘技祭を主催するカゲヤマと、花形闘士である黄金頭巾が現れた。マーティンは覆面闘技祭がマスクカーニバルの模倣だと主張するが、カゲヤマはそれを否定。黄金頭巾との対決で決着をつけることになった。第二波止場の「マーティン」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_08Committed to his course, Martyn wisely chooses to spend the time leading up to the exhibition match investigating the fighting style of his opponent. Meanwhile, he exhorts you to continue your training in preparation for the unlikely event that you will be required to take his place in the arena.

※The next blue mage quest will be available from Martyn upon reaching level 65 and learning Tingle.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SEQ_08マーティンと話した。彼は試合に向けて黄金頭巾の下調べをするという。控え闘士として、腕を磨いて、青魔法「ビリビリ」をラーニングして、マーティンのもとへ戻ってこよう。

※青魔道士のレベルが65以上になり、青魔法「ビリビリ」をラーニングすると、第二波止場のマーティンから次の青魔道士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Martyn in Kugane.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_TODO_00<tab>クガネのマーティンと話す

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_TODO_01<tab>Question customers at the Shiokaze Hostelry.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_TODO_01<tab>潮風亭で情報収集する

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Martyn.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_TODO_02<tab>マーティンと話す

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Martyn once more.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_TODO_03<tab>マーティンと再度話す

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the Fighting Festival ticket taker.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_TODO_04<tab>覆面闘技祭のもぎりと話す

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_PYANDIH_100_000<tab>Wasn't there something Martyn thought you should learn before you came back to me? I know he's a little flighty, but his instincts for this kind of thing are often strangely helpful...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_PYANDIH_100_000)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
せっかく来てくれたのですが、先生のお達しどおり、
青魔法「闘争本能」をラーニングしてきてもらえませんか……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>The next blue mage quest will be available from P'yandih upon learning Basic Instinct.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SYSTEM_100_001青魔法「闘争本能」をラーニングすると、ペ・ヤンディから、
次の青魔道士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_PYANDIH_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you're looking even more competent than usual. I take it you followed Martyn's advice?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_PYANDIH_000_000)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
ますます、青魔道士として腕を上げられ、
青魔法「闘争本能」もラーニングされたようですね！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_PYANDIH_000_001<tab>Well, don't slow down now, because I've been improving by leaps and bounds! The Celestium still echoes with applause for the deeds of Azuro the Fourth!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_PYANDIH_000_001私も四代目マスク・ザ・ブルーとしてデビューし、
日々、ブルースカイで技を磨いてますよ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_PYANDIH_000_002<tab>Speaking of fighting arenas, I have a letter here for you from the guildmaster. I wonder how his investigation in Kugane is progressing...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_PYANDIH_000_002ところで、「覆面闘技祭」なるものを調査するため、
クガネに向かった先生から、あなた宛てに手紙が届いてます。

source:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_003(-Martyn's Letter-)Dear )) (( )) 02 /var>,
I write to you from lands foreign and forbidding, the bubbling of the tea kettle my constant companion.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_003(-マーティンからの手紙-)拝啓、)) (( )) 02 /var>君。
異国の地にて茶の湯を沸かしながら、この手紙をしたためている。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_004<tab>(-Martyn's Letter-)<var 1A 02 /var>This missive should, by rights, be a comprehensive report on our Far Eastern competitors, but I must confess that my investigative efforts suffered a significant setback following my arrival in Kugane.<var 1A 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_004(-マーティンからの手紙-)目的の調査の進展を報告したいところだが……
実はクガネに到着早々、酷い災難に遭ってしまい、
遅々として進んでいないのだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_005<tab>(-Martyn's Letter-)<var 1A 02 /var>I fear that the true purpose of my journey here will be delayed beyond the limits of Royse's patience, thus do I humbly beg you to render your assistance.<var 1A 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_005(-マーティンからの手紙-)そこで、この遅れを取り戻すためにも、
どうか君の手を貸してもらえないだろうか？

source:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_006(-Martyn's Letter-)Please, come to the teahouse in front of the Sekiseigumi Barracks, and I will explain everything.
Waiting in hope,
Martyn
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_006(-マーティンからの手紙-)詳しい事は、ぜひ現地で直接、相談させてもらいたい。
取り急ぎ、クガネの赤誠組屯所前の茶屋まで来られたし。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_PYANDIH_000_007<tab>Oh dear. I suppose we should've expected something like this.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_PYANDIH_000_007やっぱり、先生ひとりじゃ荷が重かったようですね……。
あなたがいないとダメなようです。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_PYANDIH_000_008<tab>You will help him, won't you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? I shudder to think what kind of trouble he's found himself in...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_PYANDIH_000_008どうか、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
クガネに向かい先生の力になってあげてください。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_PYANDIH_000_010<tab>Did Martyn say to meet him in a teahouse? I don't think I've ever seen him drink tea...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_PYANDIH_000_010)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
クガネに向かい先生の力になってあげてください。
彼は赤誠組屯所前のお茶屋で待っているようです。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_020<tab>Welcome, honored customer! Can I interest you in a steaming cup of tea and a delectable dango?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_020いらっしゃいませ～。
おいしい、お茶やお団子はいかがでしょうか～？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_022<tab>Y─ <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You came!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_022<tab>ハッ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>君ではないか……！？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_A1_000_001<tab>Had a change of profession?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_A1_000_001<tab>転職した？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_A1_000_002<tab>Uh...nice robe?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_A1_000_002<tab>似合ってるよ

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_023<tab>This is part of the, um, “setback” I mentioned in my letter. I was just about done for the <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((night)) ((mornin')) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((night)) /var>)) /var> anyway, so now's as good a time as any to talk.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_023て、手紙で記したように、これは私の身に起こった、
とある災難が関係しているのだ。
ちょうど退勤時間だしな、手短に説明しよう……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_024<tab>Well, when I first arrived in Kugane, I thought to myself, “Martyn, you need to find yourself a place to stay.” It must've taken, oh, at least several moments before I got hopelessly lost in the back streets, and that's when a kindly Namazu offered to lend me a hand. Fin. Whatever.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_024クガネに到着し、ひとまず宿を探そうとした私は、
右も左もわからぬ異国の地で迷ってしまった。
そんなとき、親切なナマズが手、いやヒレを差し伸べてくれた。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_025<tab>Acceptin' his aid was the start of my misfortunes. The little bleeder had me knocked out, purse emptied, and stripped to the skin before I even knew what was happenin'.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_025ありがたいと、そのヒレを取ったのが運の尽き。
ナマズの正体は詐欺師であり、騙された私は一文無しとなって、
身ぐるみはがされてしまったのだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_026<tab>To add insult to injury, the local authorities' response to a befuddled, bare-bottomed man stumblin' about town is to lock him up on charges of public indecency.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_026災難はそれで終わらず、裸で途方に暮れて彷徨っていたところ、
今度は不審者と間違われ、赤誠組の隊士にお縄にされてな。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_027<tab>I was able to plead innocence on that count, at least, but that still left me penniless, friendless, and naked as a newborn babe. The officers took pity on me then, and arranged a job for me here at the teahouse in exchange for food and board...once they'd lent me some clothes, of course.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_027なんとか誤解は解けたものの、すかんぴんで頼れる者もなし。
そんな私に同情してくれた隊士から仕事を紹介してもらい、
この茶屋で住み込みで働くことになったというわけだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_028<tab>I've since been spendin' every spare moment learnin' the ins and outs of the perfect cup of tea, but I think I've got the hang of it now. I can finally start nosin' into that Fukumen Fighting Festival, and, with your help, hopefully make up for lost time.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_028茶の湯は奥深い、覚えるのもひと苦労で、
本来の目的が手つかずだったが、やっと余裕ができた。
君も来てくれたことだし、さっそく「覆面闘技祭」の調査といこう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_029<tab>Right, then. I'll ask some questions around the teahouse, while you interrogate the clientele of the Shiokaze Hostelry. Gently, mind you!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_029とにもかくにも、まずは情報収集からだ。
私は茶屋を回るから、君は酒場の「潮風亭」で、
聞き込みをしてもらいたい。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_030<tab>Once you've ferreted out some choice bits of information, we can meet back here and compare notes. Let's get to it!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_030お互い情報が集まったら、またここで落ち合おう。
それでは、頼んだよ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_HABOKU_000_040<tab>I know more about drinking than fighting, but even I've heard about this festival of yours... They opened its doors only a short while ago, and the battling beasts it showcases are already drawing huge crowds.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_HABOKU_000_040酒よりも、「覆面闘技祭」に興味があるのか？
つい最近始まった闘獣の見世物らしいが、
あっという間に人気興行になったと聞く……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_HABOKU_000_041<tab>The real stars, though, are the blue wizards. Their wild magicks bring the customers back again and again, like a smooth cup of sake.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_HABOKU_000_041なんでも、魔物の技を使うという、
「青仙術士」たちが目を引いているようだ。
酒に例えると、物珍しい新酒といったところか……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_HAYATAKA_000_042<tab>...Do I <var 1A 02 /var>know<var 1A 01 /var> of it? I've been to <var 1A 02 /var>see<var 1A 01 /var> it. Bluehood was a fan favorite for a while, but now everyone cheers for Golden Goliath.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_HAYATAKA_000_042「覆面闘技祭」なら、こないだ観にいったぜ。
当初は「青頭巾」ってヤツが花形闘士と騒がれていたが、
いまや一番人気なのは「黄金頭巾」さ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_HAYATAKA_000_043<tab>Not only has he bested every creature he's faced, he's also crushed any upstart brave enough to challenge his title.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_HAYATAKA_000_043魔物相手に負け知らずなのはもちろん、
彼に挑戦する者たちも、ことごとく打ち破った堂々の王者だ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_HAYATAKA_000_044<tab>I should warn you now, friend: tickets to the festival sell out quickly. But there's a price for everything, if you've the purse to pay for it...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_HAYATAKA_000_044言っとくが、「覆面闘技祭」の入場券は、
発売即完売って有様だから、簡単には手に入らないぞ。
まあ、金に糸目をつけなければ、手はあるがな……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_045<tab>The Fukumen Fighting Festival? Men slaughtering beasts, bah! Where's the entertainment in that?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_045「覆面闘技祭」について知りたい？
人と魔物を戦わせる、あんな下品な見世物、
ワシは理解に苦しむが、大衆には人気なようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_046<tab>I can understand the commonfolk lapping it up, but it seems that even the lord bugyo has fallen under its spell. Last I heard they were hosting matches in the Noh Theater up at the castle. Unbelievable...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_046我慢ならんのは、クガネ奉行にまで気に入られ、
いまやクガネ城の「天守能楽堂」で行われていること。
まったく、お奉行は何を考えておられるのやら……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_HABOKU_000_047<tab>That's all I know about the festival, but should you have any questions about sake...
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_HABOKU_000_047<tab>「覆面闘技祭」もいいが、酒について聞いていかぬか……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_HAYATAKA_000_048<tab>Like I said, you might have trouble securing tickets to a match─especially if you're keen to see Golden Goliath. You either need to be extremely swift...or extremely rich.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_HAYATAKA_000_048「覆面闘技祭」の入場券は即完売するので、入手は難しい。
それこそ、「黄金頭巾」の試合の券は争奪戦になるんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_049<tab>The theater was built as a stage to exhibit our traditional art forms, not this vulgar circus for the bloodthirsty masses. This “festival” is an insult to our cultural heritage.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_049クガネ城の「天守能楽堂」と言えば、その名の通り、
能楽をはじめとした、伝統文化を披露するためにある。
品のない大衆興行を催すような場ではないのだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_050<tab>What did we find out, then?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_050<tab>さて、情報は集まっただろうか……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_051<tab>Hmmm, sounds to me like the festival is a recent phenomenon...which means it's almost certainly an imitation of our Masked Carnivale.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_051なるほど……。
「覆面闘技祭」が、最近始まったものだということは、
やはり、我らのマスクカーニバルを模倣したに違いない。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_052<tab>If we're to be completely sure, though, I need to see one of these matches with my own eyes.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_052それを確かめるためにも、
いちど、かの興行をこの目で見なければなるまい。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_053<tab>Now, I heard the same thing as you did about buying tickets: seems they all sell out before you can bloody blink. But rumor has it they do a thrivin' trade on the black market.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_053入場券が入手困難ということは、私も聞いている。
だが、闇商人が裏で売買しているという噂を耳にした。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_054<tab>And as much as I'd prefer to avoid dealin' with back-alley types, I don't think we have time to mess about. Let's wander the streets around Kogane Dori, and see what's on offer, shall we?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_054そのような輩から購入するのは、負い目を感じるが、
これも調査のためだ、背に腹は代えられん。
闇商人が出没するという、「小金通り」の裏路地に向かおう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_060<tab>Keep an eye out for any shady-lookin' characters...
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_060<tab>さて、闇商人はこの辺りを縄張りとしているそうだが……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_GYODO_000_061<tab>(-???-)Festival tickets! I have tickets for the fukumen and the fighting, yes, yes!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_GYODO_000_061(-聞き覚えのある声-)あるっぺよ～！
「覆面闘技祭」の入場券あるっぺよ～！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_GYODO_000_062<tab>(-Shifty Namazu-)<gasp> Y-You! I know you!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_GYODO_000_062(-闇商人らしきナマズオ-)うぺぺぺぺ……！？
が、なんでこんなところにいるっぺな！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_Q2_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_A2_000_001<tab>Gyoshin!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_A2_000_001<tab>お前はギョシン！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_A2_000_002<tab>Gyodo!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_A2_000_002<tab>お前はギョドウ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_A2_000_003<tab>Gyofun!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_A2_000_003<tab>お前はギョフン！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_GYODO_000_063<tab>Ugh, the name is Gyodo! Gyoh. Doh.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_GYODO_000_063<tab>ギョドウだっぺ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_GYODO_100_063<tab>Yes, yes, it is I! Your faithful Gyodo!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_GYODO_100_063さっすが、！
ギョドウっぺよ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_064<tab>Wait, you're that Namazu who robbed me!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_064<tab>お、お前は、あのときの卑劣な詐欺師……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_GYODO_000_065<tab>Well...you were all but asking to be robbed! How was I to know you were acquainted with our mutual friend, here?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_GYODO_000_065あのときのチョロい異国人っぺな……！
うぺぺ……まさかの知り合いだったなんて、
思いもしなかったっぺよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_066<tab>I ought to gut you here in the street! Where's my money!? Where are my <var 1A 02 /var>clothes<var 1A 01 /var>, you nasty little bottom-feeder!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_066お前に騙され、どんなに苦労させられたか……！
奪った私の金と、大事な衣装を返してくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_GYODO_000_067<tab>N-Now, now, let us not be hasty! Your money I can return, but the fine clothing sold quickly! Perhaps you will accept some other form of recompense, yes, yes?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_GYODO_000_067か、金は返すっぺな！
でも、あの衣装はもう売り払ってしまったっぺよ。
金に色を付けるから、勘弁してほしいっぺよ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_GYODO_000_068<tab>...Tickets! You were in search of Fukumen Fighting Festival tickets, were you not? Here, you must have this rare and valuable entry token! Free of charge!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_GYODO_000_068も、もしかして「覆面闘技祭」の入場券、探してたっぺな？
だったら、めったに手に入らないこの希少な入場券を、
特別にタダで譲ってやるっぺよ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_GYODO_000_069<tab>We are even now, yes, yes? Then I must be on my way!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_GYODO_000_069<tab>うぺぺぺぺ……それじゃ、さいならっぺよ～！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_070<tab>Well, I s'pose I'll never see my clothin' again...but at least I got some coins back, and snagged an entry ticket into the bargain.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_070やれやれ、私の一張羅は戻ってこなかったが、
多少の金と目的の品が手に入ったので、良しとしよう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_071<tab>Let's head on over to the castle, and see if there's any matches underway. I imagine there's someone collectin' tickets at the gate.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_071それでは、さっそく観戦に向かうぞ。
クガネ城の門前に「覆面闘技祭のもぎり」がいるはずだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_072<tab>This ought to be interestin'...
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_072<tab>はてさて、「覆面闘技祭」とはいかなるものか……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KUGANESTAFF_000_075<tab>Oh, are you in for a treat─the inimitable “Golden Goliath” is on the docket for today's entertainment! May I see your tickets, please?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KUGANESTAFF_000_075さあさあ、本日の「覆面闘技祭」は、
お待ちかね「黄金頭巾」の登場ですよ。
入場券をお持ちの方は、ご提示のうえご入場ください。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_076<tab>Will this get the both of us in?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_076<tab>これで、ふたり入れるだろうか？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KUGANESTAFF_000_077<tab>Certainly, sir... You are aware, however, that this token only permits entry to the preliminary matches? A full-price ticket is required to view the main event.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KUGANESTAFF_000_077もちろんですとも……。
ただ、こちらは前座試合のみの券となります。
「黄金頭巾」の試合は観戦できないので、あしからず。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_078<tab>Grrr, that slimy, bewhiskered bugger must've slipped us the cheapest one he had! Well, never mind. As long as we can get some idea of what's going on in this festival of theirs...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_078くっ、あのナマズめ……安物の入場券を握らせおって！
まあいい、「覆面闘技祭」がどういうものかさえわかれば……。
さあ、試合場に向かおう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KUGANEMC_000_080<tab>Ladies and gentlemen! Here to raise the curtain on this evening's spectacle of savagery is the illustrious sky-wrapped warrior himself...Bluehood!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KUGANEMC_000_080さてさて、今宵「覆面闘技祭」の前座を飾りますは、
ご存じ藍染め眩しい「青頭巾」！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KUGANEMC_000_081<tab>Be amazed by his cerulean arts as he tangles with a terrible and tenacious Yanxian tiger!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KUGANEMC_000_081鋭い牙むくヤンサトラ相手に、
見せてくれるか、摩訶不思議なる「青仙術」！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KUGANEMC_000_082<tab>A masterful performance! While few compare to the magnificence of Golden Goliath, who can deny the talent apparent in Bluehood─the original pioneer of blue wizardry!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KUGANEMC_000_082お見事！
真打、「黄金頭巾」には劣るものの、
青仙術士の元祖たるその腕は伊達じゃない！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_083<tab>The pioneer of─ It was <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> who brought blue magic to the masses, not this puffed-up pretender!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_083なんだって！？
青魔道士の元祖はこの私だぞ……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_084<tab>I've seen enough. The spells are real, alright, but the execution is atrocious. It's an offense against our profession! Who's behind that mask, then, I'd like to know...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_084ともかく、あれは間違いなく青魔法だった。
だが、腕はいまひとつ、所詮は猿真似だ。
それにしても、いったい誰が……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KUGANEMC_000_085<tab>And now, ladies and gentlemen! Before we progress to the main event, Bluehood himself has asked that you spare him a moment of your attention.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KUGANEMC_000_085それでは、本試合の前に、
青頭巾から皆さんに、お報せがあります。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_086<tab>(-Bluehood-)Listen one, listen all! No occult tricks or arcane incantations can contend with the all-surpassing might of blue wizardry! Who among you dreams of holding such miraculous power in the palm of his or her hand!?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_086(-青頭巾-)さあさあ、お立ち会い！
奇術、仙術数あれど、青仙術に敵うものなし！
その神秘、その奇跡、手中に収めてみたいとは思わぬか？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_087<tab>I know that voice! It's him─it's bloody Nutiba Buntiba!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_087<tab>あ、あの声は……ヌティバ・ブンティバ！？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SPECTATORMAN03990_000_088<tab>Are you saying that <var 1A 02 /var>anyone<var 1A 01 /var> can learn those spells? Even me...?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_SPECTATORMAN03990_000_088オ、オレにも青仙術が使えるっていうのか？
いったい、どうすれば……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_089<tab>(-Bluehood-)If you but possess the will, then I, the founder of azure evocations, need only to mark the way!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_089(-青頭巾-)青雲之志あるならば、
青天白日、青仙術の開祖たるこの私が、
青仙術士に至る道筋を、示してみせようじゃあないか！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_090<tab>(-Bluehood-)I have with me a surfeit of talismans to awaken the blue spirit within you, and a stack of custom-made raiments to arm and garb you!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_090(-青頭巾-)これなるは青仙術士の証たる「魂技石」、
そして特製の武具を備えた「お手軽入門一式」！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_091<tab>(-Bluehood-)Those first in line will also receive one of a limited number of blue wizardry spell tomes! Come forth, and open your purses! The bold will be rewarded!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_091(-青頭巾-)さらに、いまなら数量限定「青仙術書」も付いてくる！
さあさあ、早い者勝ちだ、買った買った！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_092<tab>That thievin' bastard! I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> I was missing a cache of soul crystals...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_092そ、そういえば、以前に青魔道士のソウルクリスタルが、
ゴッソリなくなっていることがあった……。
奴が盗んでいたのか！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_093<tab>I mean, has he no shame!? He's even stolen my old sales pitch, right down to the introductory offer!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_093しかも「お手軽入門一式」だと！？
「カンタン入門セット」の猿真似じゃないか！
商売法まで盗むなんて許さんぞ……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KUGANEMC_000_094<tab>Ladies and gentlemen! I must ask those without full-price admission tickets to kindly vacate the seats. The main event is soon to commence!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KUGANEMC_000_094これにて、お席の入れ替わりとなりますので、
本試合の観戦券をお持ちでない方は、ご退場ください。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_100<tab>I wasn't entirely sure what we'd find in there, but it wasn't the great vanishin' Nutiba, I can tell you that much.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_100まさか、こんな形で、
失踪したヌティバ・ブンティバと出会うとはな……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_101<tab>Let's wait around for a bit and see if he comes out. I think I'd like to have a few words with our buddin' entrepreneur.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_101こうなったら、ここで奴を出待ちして、
ことの真相をとことん追求してやろう！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_102<tab>Well, well, fancy meetin' you here, Nutiba! Hope you've got a good explanation for why you'd stab your old guildmaster in the back like this!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_102久しいな、ヌティバ・ブンティバ！
マスクカーニバルを模倣した「覆面闘技祭」に、
お前が出場していることの説明をしてもらおうか……！！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_103<tab>(-Bluehood-)S-Sorry? You must have mistaken me for someone else. I haven't the faintest idea wh─
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_NUTIBABUNTIBA_000_103(-青頭巾-)ひ、人違いじゃありませんか？
いったい、何の話をしているのやら……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_104<tab>You can drop the act already! I saw you flauntin' your “blue wizardry” in that farce of a performance. And don't think I didn't recognize my missin' soul crystals!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_104とぼけるな！
青仙術士とやらも、我ら青魔道士の猿真似ではないか！
ソウルクリスタルを盗んだのもお前だろう！？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KAGEYAMA_000_105<tab>Now see here! I don't know who you are or what you want, but I'll not have you endangering my investment! Have a care with whom you meddle!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KAGEYAMA_000_105まてまて、どこのどいつか知らんが、
このワシが主催する興行にケチをつけるとは何事じゃ！
まさか、ワシの名を知らぬわけではあるまい……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KAGEYAMA_000_106<tab>Hah! Strangers in this land, are you? Then you would do well to learn the name of Kageyama, merchant prince of Kugane!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KAGEYAMA_000_106そうか、お前たちは異国人か。
だったら、覚えておいて損はないぞ、
クガネ有数の豪商である、このカゲヤマの名をな……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_107<tab>Merchant...prince?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_107<tab>ご、豪商……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_108<tab>So he's just some two-gil villain, is he? Must have some stones on him if he thought he could conquer the castle, though.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_108用心棒を雇い不逞浪士とともに、
クガネ城の乗っ取りを目論んだ、たわいない小悪党？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KAGEYAMA_000_109<tab>Ah! I recognize you now! That was a misunderstanding! I was a victim of circumstance! I've since put that all behind me and resumed my place as an upstanding citizen and businessman.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KAGEYAMA_000_109お、お前はあのときの冒険者……！？
ワシはたまたま現場に居合わせただけの被害者だったのだ！
誤解も解けたので、善良な市民として商いを再開したまでじゃ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_110<tab>Coercion? Kidnapping? Sounds like a right proper piece of work.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_110さる姫への求婚のため秘宝を集めんと、
雇った男に獣人誘拐などを命じた、卑劣なる小悪党？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KAGEYAMA_000_111<tab>Ah! I recognize you now! That wasn't my idea! I was as much a victim of that awful man as anyone! In any case, I've since put all that behind me and resumed my place as an upstanding citizen and businessman.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KAGEYAMA_000_111お、お前はあのときの冒険者……！？
ワシはあの男に脅迫されていた被害者だったのだ！
誤解も解けたので、善良な市民として商いを再開したまでじゃ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_112<tab>Well, whatever you claim to be, it's clear that your enterprise is a blatant imitation of our Masked Carnivale in Ul'dah. As guildmaster of the blue mages, I demand you cease and desist in this unscrupulous attempt to profit from the spellcraft that <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> established.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_112なんであれ、「覆面闘技祭」と「青仙術士」は、
ウルダハのマスクカーニバルと、我ら青魔道士の模倣なのは明らか！
こちらは元祖として、興業の差し止めを求める……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KAGEYAMA_000_113<tab>Do you expect me to simply crumble before your insistence? Who's to say that <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> are not the ones who mimicked <var 1A 02 /var>us<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KAGEYAMA_000_113ふん、言いがかりも甚だしい。
大体、真似したのはお前たちの方じゃないのか？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KAGEYAMA_000_114<tab>If you truly are the founder of blue magic, then you won't mind giving us all a demonstration of your powers. I challenge you to face the greatest combatant in the history of the Fukumen Fighting Festival─the undefeated Golden Goliath!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KAGEYAMA_000_114それでも、元祖だと言い張るのならば、実力で証明してみせよ。
我が覆面闘技祭の花形闘士「黄金頭巾」と勝負するのだ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KAGEYAMA_000_115<tab>Prove yourself against our champion, and we'll surrender to your demands. You find these terms acceptable, I trust?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KAGEYAMA_000_115本当にそちらが元祖で、こちらが模倣だというならば、
まさか負けることはあるまい……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_116<tab>O-Of course! Consider your challenge accepted!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_116も、もちろんだとも！
その勝負、受けて立とう……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KAGEYAMA_000_117<tab>Hm hm hm, very good. I shall organize an exhibition match for the purpose, and inform you of the schedule at a later date. Don't stray too far, now...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_KAGEYAMA_000_117グフフフフフ……
特別に対外試合を組んでやるゆえ、ありがたく思え。
日程は追って伝えよう、くれぐれも逃げるなよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_118<tab>...Gods above, what've I got myself into this time? Come on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I need to run back to the teahouse. My shift is about to start.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_118抗議するつもりが、思わぬ展開となってしまったな……。
すまんが、そろそろ勤務時間だ……茶屋に戻ろう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_120<tab>Right. All I have to do is beat this Golden Goliath fellow, and the festival is history. I mean, how difficult could it be? Even if he is their “champion,” the whole thing is an inferior contest in the first place.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_120さて、「覆面闘技祭」の差し止めをかけて、
「黄金頭巾」と勝負する運びとなったわけだが……
もちろん、この私が戦うつもりだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_121<tab>But even though I'm sure to win, it never pays to be overconfident. Best do some more investigatin' before the match, I'm thinkin'.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_121相手は花形闘士というが、所詮は猿真似興業。
こちらの勝利を確信しているが、念には念を入れておきたい。
試合までに、しっかり下調べしておこう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_122<tab>By the way, you might want to keep yourself up to snuff on the off chance I'm unfit for battle on the day. Tingle is a handy spell to know! Ahem, anyway. It's back to work for me.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ630_03990_MARTYN_000_122不測の事態に備え、君は控え闘士として、
青魔法「ビリビリ」をラーニングし、腕を磨いておいてくれ！
それでは……私は仕事に戻ろう。
